body_html:
I hit the exact same issue. Here are the steps I followed:

  1. Installed Anaconda3-5.3.0-Windws-x86_64 on Windows 10 PC.

  2. Downgrade python to 3.6.7 since python 3.7 is not supported yet.

  3. pip install tensorflow

  4. when do "import tensorflow as tf" in jupyter notebook, it complains
    tf.estimator package not installed.
    tf.estimator package not installed.

  5. when do "import pandas as pd", it complains the following. Even after I uninstalled tensorflow, it still has the same issue.
    AttributeError Traceback (most recent call last)
    in
    ----> 1 import pandas as pd

C:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas_init_.py in
40 import pandas.core.config_init
41
---> 42 from pandas.core.api import *
43 from pandas.core.sparse.api import *
44 from pandas.tseries.api import *

C:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas\core\api.py in
8 from pandas.core.dtypes.missing import isna, isnull, notna, notnull
9 from pandas.core.arrays import Categorical
---> 10 from pandas.core.groupby.groupby import Grouper
11 from pandas.io.formats.format import set_eng_float_format
12 from pandas.core.index import (Index, CategoricalIndex, Int64Index,

C:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas\core\groupby_init_.py in
1 # flake8: noqa
----> 2 from pandas.core.groupby.groupby import (
3 Grouper, GroupBy, SeriesGroupBy, DataFrameGroupBy
4 )

C:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas\core\groupby\groupby.py in
47 CategoricalIndex, _ensure_index)
48 from pandas.core.arrays import ExtensionArray, Categorical
---> 49 from pandas.core.frame import DataFrame
50 from pandas.core.generic import NDFrame, _shared_docs
51 from pandas.core.internals import BlockManager, make_block

C:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas\core\frame.py in
72 create_block_manager_from_arrays,
73 create_block_manager_from_blocks)
---> 74 from pandas.core.series import Series
75 from pandas.core.arrays import Categorical, ExtensionArray
76 import pandas.core.algorithms as algorithms

C:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas\core\series.py in
65 from pandas.compat.numpy import function as nv
66
---> 67 import pandas.core.ops as ops
68 import pandas.core.algorithms as algorithms
69

AttributeError: module 'pandas' has no attribute 'core'
body_text:
I hit the exact same issue. Here are the steps I followed:


Installed Anaconda3-5.3.0-Windws-x86_64 on Windows 10 PC.


Downgrade python to 3.6.7 since python 3.7 is not supported yet.


pip install tensorflow


when do "import tensorflow as tf" in jupyter notebook, it complains
tf.estimator package not installed.
tf.estimator package not installed.


when do "import pandas as pd", it complains the following. Even after I uninstalled tensorflow, it still has the same issue.
AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
 in 
----> 1 import pandas as pd


C:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas_init_.py in 
40 import pandas.core.config_init
41
---> 42 from pandas.core.api import *

body:
I hit the exact same issue. Here are the steps I followed:
1. Installed Anaconda3-5.3.0-Windws-x86_64 on Windows 10 PC.
2. Downgrade python to 3.6.7 since python 3.7 is not supported yet.
3. pip install tensorflow

4. when do "import tensorflow as tf" in jupyter notebook, it complains 
tf.estimator package not installed.
tf.estimator package not installed.

5. when do "import pandas as pd", it complains the following. Even after I uninstalled tensorflow, it still has the same issue.
AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-2-7dd3504c366f> in <module>
----> 1 import pandas as pd

C:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas\__init__.py in <module>
     40 import pandas.core.config_init
     41 
---> 42 from pandas.core.api import *
     43 from pandas.core.sparse.api import *
     44 from pandas.tseries.api import *

C:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas\core\api.py in <module>
      8 from pandas.core.dtypes.missing import isna, isnull, notna, notnull
      9 from pandas.core.arrays import Categorical
---> 10 from pandas.core.groupby.groupby import Grouper
     11 from pandas.io.formats.format import set_eng_float_format
     12 from pandas.core.index import (Index, CategoricalIndex, Int64Index,

C:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas\core\groupby\__init__.py in <module>
      1 # flake8: noqa
----> 2 from pandas.core.groupby.groupby import (
      3     Grouper, GroupBy, SeriesGroupBy, DataFrameGroupBy
      4 )

C:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas\core\groupby\groupby.py in <module>
     47                                CategoricalIndex, _ensure_index)
     48 from pandas.core.arrays import ExtensionArray, Categorical
---> 49 from pandas.core.frame import DataFrame
     50 from pandas.core.generic import NDFrame, _shared_docs
     51 from pandas.core.internals import BlockManager, make_block

C:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas\core\frame.py in <module>
     72                                    create_block_manager_from_arrays,
     73                                    create_block_manager_from_blocks)
---> 74 from pandas.core.series import Series
     75 from pandas.core.arrays import Categorical, ExtensionArray
     76 import pandas.core.algorithms as algorithms

C:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas\core\series.py in <module>
     65 from pandas.compat.numpy import function as nv
     66 
---> 67 import pandas.core.ops as ops
     68 import pandas.core.algorithms as algorithms
     69 

AttributeError: module 'pandas' has no attribute 'core'
